text: "Change of Heart" is a 1986 song by Cyndi Lauper and is the second single from her second studio album True Colors. It went to number 3 in the United States, number 67 in the United Kingdom, number 1 in Israel, number 13 in Canada, number 41 in New Zealand, number 15 in Australia, number 8 in France and number 4 in Chile. ==Track listing== * US 12" single #"Change of Heart" (Extended Version) – 7:52 #"Heartbeats" – 4:49 #"Change of Heart" (Instrumental) – 5:52 #"Witness" – 3:38 * US 7" single #"Change of Heart" – 3:58 #"Witness" – 3:38 * UK 12" single #"Change of Heart" (Extended Version) – 7:52 #"Heartbeats" – 4:49 #"Change of Heart" (Instrumental) – 5:52 #"What a Thrill" – 3:00 * UK 7" single #"Change of Heart" – 3:58 #"What a Thrill" – 3:00 ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:Cyndi Lauper songs
title: Change of Heart (Cyndi Lauper song)
